name: Stalk Tracker
description: A discord bot to keep track of turnip prices!

MONGOGB_URI.description: The URI of the mongoDB instance given to you by Heroku. Leave this how it is for now, but FILL IT IN LATER with the URI from mLab

SEND_UPDATES.description: A boolean flag (`true` or `false`) for whether or not to post updates to the update channel

COMMAND_CHANNEL.description: The ID of the channel to run commands in

UPDATE_CHANNEL.description: the ID of the channel to post updates to

TIMEZONE.description: In standard ISO format such as `America/Denver`

TOKEN.description: The Discord bot token for it to log into.
